EmailTemplate.description: Follow-up response (when parent case is assigned to other queues: CM/BSA/Salesops)
EmailTemplate.name: Follow-up response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Good day! Thanks for reaching out to the Salesforce Helpdesk Team.
Your original request {!Case.Parent} is currently assigned to the “respective team name”.
We are forwarding your follow-up request to them so that they can provide you with the solution at the earliest.
Feel free to reach out to us in case of any queries.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Helpdesk
